title: Brown Cotton Embroidered Draped Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a brown cotton draped flowing dress with full sleeves and crew neck, intricate tonal embroidery on bodice and sleeve cuffs, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and trims

techpack.care_instructions: machine wash cold, line dry, warm iron on reverse

provenance.inspiration: Earthy tones and artisanal embroidery inspired by rustic countryside aesthetics
